weapons.name: Yurei
weapons.description: An Arasaka prototype stolen in a legendary heist. Cooled by a cryogenic agent, its silent operation and freezing rounds make it the perfect tool for a ghost.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires cryogenic rounds that slow enemies and can freeze them solid on a critical hit. The weapon is completely silent.

weapons.name: Cerberus
weapons.description: A decommissioned prototype from the disastrous 'Operation Tartarus.' Its triple-barreled design is brutally effective but dangerously unstable, a symbol of corporate hubris.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires a three-round burst in a horizontal spread. The last round is a micro-grenade with a high chance to knock down and cripple limbs.

weapons.name: Longinus
weapons.description: The one-of-a-kind rifle used to assassinate the legendary Arasaka sniper, 'Shaitan.' A monstrous anti-materiel weapon that fires an accelerating tungsten spike.
weapons.specialAbility: A fully charged shot has 100% Armor Penetration and deals bonus damage based on distance. Critical headshots ricochet to a second target.

weapons.name: Beso Mortal
weapons.description: A sacred, one-of-a-kind revolver forged as a wedding gift that became a funeral relic. A symbol of a tragic love and a lasting blood feud.
weapons.specialAbility: Rounds have a high chance to charm enemies. Headshots on charmed enemies cause them to explode, spreading the effect.

weapons.name: The Organ Grinder
weapons.description: The signature weapon of the Scavenger bogeyman, 'Yarilo.' This master-crafted chainsword is the original from which all other Gut Rippers are copied. It is infamous for the 'Meat Locker Massacre.'
weapons.specialAbility: Every hit applies a strong Bleed and can cause Terror. Fully charged attacks are guaranteed to dismember.

weapons.name: Old Glory
weapons.description: The signature weapon of the 6th Street hero, 'Sarge' Miller, used in his legendary last stand. A sacred relic and a symbol of ultimate valor.
weapons.specialAbility: Rate of fire, Crit Chance, and Dismemberment Chance increase the longer you fire. Final 10 rounds are guaranteed electrical crits.

weapons.name: System Crash
weapons.description: The personal, one-of-a-kind prototype stolen from the Netwatch agent Kurtz by the legendary netrunner 'Glitch.' A ghost story in the Net given physical form.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires EMP packets that disable cyberware. A charged shot uploads the 'System Crash' quickhack, causing a full cyberware reboot.

weapons.name: Ghede's Kiss
weapons.description: The first and most powerful Loa blade. A heretical artifact from a failed ritual, it is a cursed but powerful bridge to the chaos of the Old Net.
weapons.specialAbility: Hits apply the 'Soul-Cut' quickhack, draining RAM. Kills restore RAM and can upload a random daemon to a nearby enemy.

weapons.name: The Hummingbird
weapons.description: The one-of-a-kind prototype wielded by the legendary speed-solo 'Zane.' A perfect assassination tool designed to operate in the spaces between seconds.
weapons.specialAbility: Massively increased fire rate, reload speed, and Crit Damage while Sandevistan is active. Silent to enemies during time dilation.

weapons.name: Big Henry
weapons.description: Sasquatch's signature weapon and symbol of her rule. Forged from the spoils of her victory over a rival champion, it is the crown of the Animals.
weapons.specialAbility: Heavy attacks are unblockable and stagger. A charged heavy attack creates a shockwave. Kills with heavy attacks grant a massive armor boost.

weapons.name: The Vindicator
weapons.description: The signature weapon of the Nomad folk hero, Nash. A master-crafted shotgun used to single-handedly destroy a Militech convoy, it is a symbol of Nomad defiance.
weapons.specialAbility: A charged shot fires both barrels with massive armor penetration, applying a powerful Burn. Kills on burning enemies cause them to explode.

weapons.name: Gonk's Gambit
weapons.description: The signature weapon of the Watson folk hero, Joe 'The Prophet.' A master-crafted but dangerously unstable revolver that is a symbol of desperate, tragic heroism.
weapons.specialAbility: Alt-fire unloads the cylinder in a chaotic burst with high Crit Damage and Knockdown chance, but can jam.

weapons.name: White Tiger's Fang
weapons.description: A masterwork katana forged for a master's greatest student, but stolen in an act of betrayal. A beautiful but cursed symbol of a blood debt.
weapons.specialAbility: Consecutive hits increase attack and movement speed. After 5 hits, allows for a dash-strike that refreshes on kill.

weapons.name: Iris
weapons.description: A unique Kiroshi prototype used to blind a genius and steal his masterpiece. The ultimate tool for a corporate ghost, a legend of the espionage world.
weapons.specialAbility: Critical hits apply 'System Blind,' disabling optics and scrambling the HUD. Takedowns on blinded enemies are faster and silent.

weapons.name: Psycho-Soother
weapons.description: An unstable Netwatch prototype from a failed experiment that created a cyberpsycho. A weapon of immense power and terrifying risk.
weapons.specialAbility: A charged shot applies 'Cyberware Malfunction' and 'Reboot Optics' in a cone. Has a small chance to cause 'System Shock,' turning an enemy cyberpsycho.

weapons.name: The Scream
weapons.description: The one-of-a-kind prototype used to bloodlessly neutralize an entire Arasaka elite squad. A legend of corporate espionage and non-lethal warfare.
weapons.specialAbility: A charged shot stuns and scrambles optics in a cone, making targets vulnerable to a unique 'Shatter' quickhack that causes their cyberware to explode.

weapons.name: The Dentist
weapons.description: Brick's original, master-crafted Pain-Drill from the 'Siege of All Foods.' A symbol of Maelstrom's defiance and their brutal philosophy.
weapons.specialAbility: A charged heavy attack destroys armor and applies Bleed. The overclocked engine can ignite the wielder, granting bonus damage.

weapons.name: Kage-no-Yaiba
weapons.description: The personal blade of Sandayu Oda, stolen by Goro Takemura. A one-of-a-kind masterpiece and a symbol of a deep, personal rivalry between master assassins.
weapons.specialAbility: Lunging heavy attacks have 100% Crit Chance. Stealth takedowns activate a longer, more powerful Optical Camo and speed boost.

weapons.name: The Hexer
weapons.description: The first and most powerful 'Ghede's Gaze.' An unstable prototype from a failed ritual, it carries a chaotic, sentient AI from the Old Net.
weapons.specialAbility: Critical hits can apply a random, mid-tier quickhack. Has a small chance on crit to upload the 'Cyberpsychosis' quickhack.

weapons.name: Dead-Stop
weapons.description: The signature weapon of the Militech war hero, Sgt. 'Bastion' Miller. A symbol of his legendary last stand and the 'hold the line' doctrine.
weapons.specialAbility: After standing still, gain massively increased accuracy and a guaranteed critical hit that knocks down. Headshot kills ricochet.

weapons.name: The Anatomist
weapons.description: The original, AI-designed prototype that proved the superiority of machine over man in weapons design. A cold, calculating, and perfect killing machine.
weapons.specialAbility: Automatically tags 3 weak points. A charged shot hits all three simultaneously, applying 'System Shock' to disable cyberware.

weapons.name: Kabuki-yaki
weapons.description: A cursed shotgun from a failed ritual, haunted by the vengeful spirit of a dishonored warrior. A beautiful, powerful, and utterly heretical weapon.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires incendiary pellets. Defeating an enemy causes a massive explosion. Kills on burning enemies can trigger 'Cyberpsychosis' in a nearby foe.

weapons.name: The Corner-Cutter
weapons.description: The signature weapon of the legendary corporate spy, 'The Ghost.' A one-of-a-kind prototype that bends the rules of reality to hit targets from impossible angles.
weapons.specialAbility: Alt-fire shoots a ricocheting tracer dart. All shots home in on the tracer with increased speed and ricochet potential. Crits bypass armor.

weapons.name: Big Bertha
weapons.description: The legendary breaching tool that blew a hole in an 'unbreachable' Arasaka vault. A symbol of the Animals' terrifying, unpredictable power.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires a grenade with a huge blast radius that guarantees knockdown and releases an EMP burst on detonation.

weapons.name: The Shepherd's Crook
weapons.description: The signature weapon of the legendary bodyguard, 'The Shepherd.' A master-crafted staff that is the ultimate symbol of defensive mastery.
weapons.specialAbility: Non-lethal. Blocking builds a charge. A heavy attack releases a chain lightning blast. Perfectly timed blocks instantly build a full charge.
